title: Post Impressions I
first_line: windows go orange in the slowly.
text:
windows go orange in the slowly.
town,    night
featherly swifts
the
   Dark on us
all;
   stories told returned

   gather

   the

Again:who
danc    ing
goes utter     ly

churning
witty,twitters

              upon Our

(ta-te-ta
in a parenthesis!said the moon

                               )
description: windows go orange in the slowly.
seo_title: windows go orange in the slowly.
seo_description: A poem by E. E. Cummings in “&”
